Title: Burden of Proof/Backfire
Plot: A woman is shot and killed in her home. The detectives find the victims car with a suspect behind the wheel. Holding the suspect on stolen property can the gather enough evidence for murder? When two men try to rob a vender one is shot and killed. Once the trigger man is found they need the second robber to put all the piece together.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and content that may disturb
